name: Emma Watson
bio: Emma Charlotte Duerre Watson is an English actress, model, and activist, known for her role as Hermione Granger in the Harry Potter film series.

name: Rupert Grint
bio: Rupert Alexander Lloyd Grint is an English actor, known for his role as Ron Weasley in the Harry Potter film series.

name: Mark Hamill
bio: Mark Richard Hamill is an American actor, voice actor, and writer, best known for his role as Luke Skywalker in the Star Wars film series.

name: Harrison Ford
bio: Harrison Ford is an American actor, best known for his roles as Han Solo in the Star Wars series and Indiana Jones in the Indiana Jones series.

name: Carrie Fisher
bio: Carrie Frances Fisher was an American actress and writer, best known for her role as Princess Leia in the Star Wars film series.

name: Elijah Wood
bio: Elijah Jordan Wood is an American actor and producer, best known for his role as Frodo Baggins in the Lord of the Rings film series.

name: Ian McKellen
bio: Sir Ian Murray McKellen is an English actor, best known for his roles as Gandalf in the Lord of the Rings and Hobbit film series and Magneto in the X-Men film series.

name: Orlando Bloom
bio: Orlando Jonathan Blanchard Copeland Bloom is an English actor, best known for his roles as Legolas in the Lord of the Rings and Hobbit film series and Will Turner in the Pirates of the Caribbean film series.

name: Ryan Reynolds
bio: Ryan Rodney Reynolds is a Canadian actor, best known for his roles in Deadpool, The Proposal, and Van Wilder.

name: Morena Baccarin
bio: Morena Silva de Vaz Setta Baccarin is a Brazilian-American actress, best known for her roles in Deadpool, Firefly, and Gotham.

name: T.J. Miller
bio: Todd Joseph Miller is an American actor and comedian, best known for his roles in Deadpool, Silicon Valley, and Cloverfield.

name: Vin Diesel
bio: Mark Sinclair, known professionally as Vin Diesel, is an American actor and producer, best known for his roles in the Fast & Furious film series, xXx, and Guardians of the Galaxy.

name: Paul Walker
bio: Paul William Walker IV was an American actor, best known for his role as Brian O'Conner in the Fast & Furious film series.

name: Michelle Rodriguez
bio: Mayte Michelle Rodriguez is an American actress, best known for her roles in the Fast & Furious film series, Resident Evil, and Avatar.

name: Sean Connery
bio: Sir Sean Connery was a Scottish actor, best known for his portrayal of James Bond in seven Bond films between 1962 and 1983.

name: Ursula Andress
bio: Ursula Andress is a Swiss actress, best known for her role as Honey Ryder in the first James Bond film, Dr. No.

name: Bernard Lee
bio: John Bernard Lee was an English actor, best known for his role as M in the first eleven James Bond films.

name: Sam Neill
bio: Sir Nigel John Dermot 'Sam' Neill is a New Zealand actor, best known for his roles in Jurassic Park, The Hunt for Red October, and The Piano.

name: Laura Dern
bio: Laura Elizabeth Dern is an American actress, best known for her roles in Jurassic Park, Wild, and Big Little Lies.

name: Jeff Goldblum
bio: Jeffrey Lynn Goldblum is an American actor, best known for his roles in Jurassic Park, Independence Day, and The Fly.

name: Tom Cruise
bio: Thomas Cruise Mapother IV, known professionally as Tom Cruise, is an American actor and producer, best known for his roles in Top Gun, Mission: Impossible series, and Jerry Maguire.

name: Jeremy Renner
bio: Jeremy Lee Renner is an American actor, best known for his roles in The Hurt Locker, The Avengers series, and Mission: Impossible series.

name: Simon Pegg
bio: Simon John Pegg is an English actor, comedian, and screenwriter, best known for his roles in Shaun of the Dead, Hot Fuzz, and the Star Trek and Mission: Impossible film series.

name: Johnny Depp
bio: John Christopher Depp II is an American actor, producer, and musician, best known for his roles in Pirates of the Caribbean series, Edward Scissorhands, and Sweeney Todd.

name: Geoffrey Rush
bio: Geoffrey Roy Rush is an Australian actor, best known for his roles in Pirates of the Caribbean series, Shine, and The King's Speech.

name: Shia LaBeouf
bio: Shia Saide LaBeouf is an American actor, performance artist, and filmmaker, best known for his roles in Transformers series, Holes, and Fury.

name: Megan Fox
bio: Megan Denise Fox is an American actress and model, best known for her roles in Transformers series, Jennifer's Body, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

name: Patrick Stewart
bio: Sir Patrick Stewart is an English actor, best known for his roles as Captain Jean-Luc Picard in Star Trek series and Professor X in the X-Men film series.

name: Hugh Jackman
bio: Hugh Michael Jackman is an Australian actor, best known for his role as Wolverine in the X-Men film series, and for his roles in Les Mis√©rables and The Greatest Showman.

name: Jennifer Lawrence
bio: Jennifer Shrader Lawrence is an American actress. Her films have grossed over $6 billion worldwide, and she was the highest-paid actress in the world in 2015 and 2016.

name: Tilda Swinton
bio: Katherine Matilda Swinton is a British actress, known for her roles in The Chronicles of Narnia series, Doctor Strange, and We Need to Talk About Kevin.

name: Georgie Henley
bio: Georgina Helen Henley is an English actress, best known for her portrayal of Lucy Pevensie in The Chronicles of Narnia film series.

name: William Moseley
bio: William Peter Moseley is an English actor, best known for his role as Peter Pevensie in The Chronicles of Narnia film series.

name: Tom Hanks
bio: Thomas Jeffrey Hanks is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his various comedic and dramatic film roles, including Splash, Big, Forrest Gump, Apollo 13, and Saving Private Ryan.

name: Tim Allen
bio: Timothy Alan Dick, known professionally as Tim Allen, is an American actor and comedian. He is known for his roles in Home Improvement, Toy Story series, and Galaxy Quest.

name: Don Rickles
bio: Donald Jay Rickles was an American stand-up comedian, actor, and author, known especially for his insult comedy.

name: Keanu Reeves
bio: Keanu Charles Reeves is a Canadian actor, best known for his roles in The Matrix series, Speed, and John Wick series.

name: Laurence Fishburne
bio: Laurence John Fishburne III is an American actor, playwright, producer, and director. He is known for his roles in The Matrix series, Boyz n the Hood, and Apocalypse Now.

name: Carrie-Anne Moss
bio: Carrie-Anne Moss is a Canadian actress, best known for her role as Trinity in The Matrix series and for her roles in Memento, Chocolat, and Disturbia.

name: Bruce Willis
bio: Walter Bruce Willis is an American actor, producer, and singer. He is best known for his roles in Die Hard series, Pulp Fiction, The Sixth Sense, and Armageddon.

name: Alan Rickman
bio: Alan Sidney Patrick Rickman was an English actor and director, known for his roles in Die Hard, Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves, Harry Potter series, and Sense and Sensibility.

name: Bonnie Bedelia
bio: Bonnie Bedelia Culkin is an American actress, known for her roles in Die Hard series, They Shoot Horses, Don't They?, and Presumed Innocent.

name: Tom Hardy
bio: Edward Thomas Hardy CBE is an English actor and producer, known for his roles in The Dark Knight Rises, Mad Max: Fury Road, and Venom.

name: Charlize Theron
bio: Charlize Theron is a South African and American actress and producer. She is known for her roles in Monster, Mad Max: Fury Road, and Atomic Blonde.

name: Nicholas Hoult
bio: Nicholas Caradoc Hoult is an English actor, known for his roles in X-Men series, Warm Bodies, and Mad Max: Fury Road.

name: Martin Freeman
bio: Martin John Christopher Freeman is an English actor, best known for his roles in The Hobbit series, Sherlock, and The Office.

name: Richard Armitage
bio: Richard Crispin Armitage is an English actor, known for his roles in The Hobbit series, North & South, and Robin Hood.

name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
bio: Arnold Alois Schwarzenegger is an Austrian-American actor, businessman, retired bodybuilder, and former politician. He is known for his roles in The Terminator series, Predator, and Total Recall.

name: Linda Hamilton
bio: Linda Carroll Hamilton is an American actress, best known for her role as Sarah Connor in The Terminator series.

name: Michael Biehn
bio: Michael Connell Biehn is an American actor, known for his roles in The Terminator, Aliens, and The Abyss.

name: Marlon Brando
bio: Marlon Brando Jr. was an American actor and film director. He is credited with bringing a gripping realism to film acting, and is widely regarded as one of the greatest actors of all time.

name: Al Pacino
bio: Alfredo James Pacino is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in The Godfather series, Serpico, Scarface, and Scent of a Woman.

name: James Caan
bio: James Edmund Caan is an American actor. He is known for his roles in The Godfather, Misery, Elf, and Brian's Song.

name: Robert Downey Jr.
bio: Robert John Downey Jr. is an American actor and producer. He is known for his roles in Iron Man series, Sherlock Holmes series, and Chaplin.

name: Gwyneth Paltrow
bio: Gwyneth Kate Paltrow is an American actress, singer, author, and businesswoman. She is known for her roles in Shakespeare in Love, Iron Man series, and The Royal Tenenbaums.

name: Terrence Howard
bio: Terrence Dashon Howard is an American actor and singer. He is known for his roles in Hustle & Flow, Crash, and Iron Man series.

name: Edward Furlong
bio: Edward Walter Furlong is an American actor, best known for his role as John Connor in Terminator 2: Judgment Day.

name: Eric Bana
bio: Eric Banadinoviƒá, known professionally as Eric Bana, is an Australian actor and comedian. He is known for his roles in Munich, Hulk, and Star Trek.

name: Jennifer Connelly
bio: Jennifer Lynn Connelly is an American actress. She is known for her roles in A Beautiful Mind, Requiem for a Dream, and Labyrinth.

name: Russell Crowe
bio: Russell Ira Crowe is a New Zealand actor, producer, and musician. He is known for his roles in Gladiator, A Beautiful Mind, and Les Mis√©rables.

name: Joaquin Phoenix
bio: Joaquin Rafael Phoenix is an American actor and producer. He is known for his roles in Joker, Walk the Line, and Gladiator.

name: Connie Nielsen
bio: Connie Inge-Lise Nielsen is a Danish actress. She is known for her roles in Gladiator, Wonder Woman, and The Devil's Advocate.

name: Denzel Washington
bio: Denzel Hayes Washington Jr. is an American actor, director, and producer. He has received various accolades, including two Academy Awards, three Golden Globe Awards, and a Tony Award.

name: Dakota Fanning
bio: Hannah Dakota Fanning is an American actress. She rose to prominence at a young age for her performances in I Am Sam, War of the Worlds, and Coraline.

name: Elle Fanning
bio: Mary Elle Fanning is an American actress. She is known for her roles in Super 8, Maleficent, and The Neon Demon.

name: Angelina Jolie
bio: Angelina Jolie is an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She is known for her roles in Girl, Interrupted, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, and Maleficent.

name: Brad Pitt
bio: William Bradley Pitt is an American actor and film producer. He is known for his roles in Fight Club, Ocean's Eleven, and Once Upon a Time in Hollywood.

name: Meryl Streep
bio: Mary Louise Streep, known professionally as Meryl Streep, is an American actress. Often described as the 'best actress of her generation', she is known for her versatility and accents.

name: Julia Roberts
bio: Julia Fiona Roberts is an American actress and producer. She is known for her roles in Pretty Woman, Erin Brockovich, and Ocean's Eleven.

name: Tom Hiddleston
bio: Thomas William Hiddleston is an English actor. He is known for his roles in Thor series, The Avengers, and Crimson Peak.

name: Chris Hemsworth
bio: Christopher Hemsworth is an Australian actor. He is known for his role as Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Scarlett Johansson
bio: Scarlett Ingrid Johansson is an American actress and singer. She is known for her roles in Lost in Translation, The Avengers, and Marriage Story.

name: Robert Redford
bio: Charles Robert Redford Jr. is a retired American actor, director, and activist. He is known for his roles in Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid, The Sting, and All the President's Men.

name: Paul Newman
bio: Paul Leonard Newman was an American actor, film director, race car driver, and entrepreneur. He is known for his roles in Cool Hand Luke, The Hustler, and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

name: George Clooney
bio: George Timothy Clooney is an American actor, film director, producer, and philanthropist. He is known for his roles in Ocean's Eleven series, Syriana, and ER.

name: Bradley Cooper
bio: Bradley Charles Cooper is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in Silver Linings Playbook, American Sniper, and A Star Is Born.

name: Jennifer Garner
bio: Jennifer Anne Garner is an American actress. She is known for her roles in Alias, 13 Going on 30, and Dallas Buyers Club.

name: Matt Damon
bio: Matthew Paige Damon is an American actor, producer, and screenwriter. He is known for his roles in Good Will Hunting, The Martian, and Jason Bourne series.

name: Julianne Moore
bio: Julie Anne Smith, known professionally as Julianne Moore, is an American actress and author. She is known for her roles in Boogie Nights, The Hours, and Still Alice.

name: Willem Dafoe
bio: William James Dafoe is an American actor. He is known for his roles in Platoon, Shadow of the Vampire, and The Florida Project.

name: Tommy Lee Jones
bio: Tommy Lee Jones is an American actor and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in The Fugitive, Men in Black series, and No Country for Old Men.

name: Will Smith
bio: Willard Carroll Smith Jr. is an American actor and rapper. He is known for his roles in The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air, Men in Black series, and Ali.

name: Linda Fiorentino
bio: Clorinda Fiorentino, known professionally as Linda Fiorentino, is an American actress. She is known for her roles in The Last Seduction, Men in Black, and Jade.

name: Anthony Hopkins
bio: Sir Philip Anthony Hopkins is a Welsh actor, director, and producer. He is known for his roles in The Silence of the Lambs, The Remains of the Day, and The Two Popes.

name: Natalie Portman
bio: Natalie Portman is an actress and filmmaker with dual Israeli and American citizenship. She is known for her roles in Black Swan, V for Vendetta, and Jackie.

name: Tao Okamoto
bio: Tao Okamoto is a Japanese actress and model. She is known for her roles in The Wolverine, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, and Chi no Wadachi.
